评论详情: They are comfortable, easy to care for, and stylish!  I originally bought three and subsequently bought four more.  I have almost every color at this point.  They are long enough to cover your front and bum.  They are loose fitting but still flattering.  As for care, I wash them with other dark colors and hang on hangers to dry, which takes about 15 minutes.  They are a stretchy, light-weight material which wicks away moisture so they are wearable fall, spring, and most of the humid New Jersey summer.
Love this shirt. I have it in several colors. It washes well and seems to be good quality. I wish they had solid color options not heather.

I ordered a large in this shirt based on others’ reviews, and it was too big on me. I am returning for a medium. For reference, I am 5’ 4” and 131 lbs. I do like the color (heathered mauve), the length, and the looser fit.i think it will be good for Pilates.
Very soft and comfortable. I highly recommend. Thank you!

Very comfortable top. I workout in it.

评论概述: Wonderful lightweight material that doesn’t cling!
评论详情: I’m a Northerner who now lives in the south, so I’m always too warm. It’s hard to find non-summery clothes that I can tolerate. This is it!

评论概述: This short sleeve top is Great for Workout!
评论详情: Please note the top is short sleeved and not long sleeved! I am so comfortable with this top for exercising ie Pilatea or walking or cleaning up my house! It’s very easy to clean! Enjoy!

评论概述: no shape like in the picture- it's based on a mens T shirt frame
评论详情: This is one of those disappointing things where they take a men's squared off T shirt and blow up the square shape and proportions to "plus" sizes and there is no shape to suit a woman's waist, boobs, hips, etc... it's nice and long - tunic length even on this 5'10 woman and it's a knit- but it's definitely not shaped for a woman.
Fits perfectly.

This shirt feels nice and has a little more style than a regular t-shirt. I knocked it down one star because I  feel it runs a little small, even with the flare through the hips it doesn't flow like I would like it too. (too snug)

Love the top.  Will keep it but it does run a little large.  Next time I will go down a size.I am normally an XL but ordered a XXL since it’s for the gym and did not want a tight fit.  Could have ordered my regular size.
Well made shirt. The material is soft to the touch and feels very durable.
I loved this shirt-well made and great fabric but the  size ran really small. I would buy it again if they made their sizes closer to normal. I up sized but still too small.

It's cute, but because it is thin, it is a little clingy. It isn't a good winter shirt unless you want to layer, but then you couldn't see the shirt. I like it, and kept it, but would likely wear it in the spring. I am 5'3" and bought a medium. Small would fit me if you like the shirt tighter.

I teach movement and I was looking for a shirt that would be flattering and wrinkle resistant for the teaching portion of my interview. This shirt is wonderful! The stitching gives the shirt flair, the tulip shape is one that is flattering. The length hits me perfectly, the shirt is not too short. I might even call this tunic length (my favorite!). Washes well.
Shipping was on time.  Love the color and softness.
Based on other reviews, I did size up, and it fit perfectly!  I love this top for the gym and I’m going to order another one as well!

评论概述: Such a great and CUTE top!
评论详情: I love this top!  I love that it is a bit longer too, as it looks so nice with leggings or tighter pants.  I wear it for Yoga and Tai Chi classes.  Again, the longer length is good for this too!  It is cute and fashionable and stretchy too.  So, you can exercise all you want.  Oh, and no wrinkles either!!  I am 5'7 and 146 pounds.  I bought it in a large.  It fits perfectly and covers my rear-end. I would buy it again and will probably do so too!
I bought both styles and love them. Extremely soft, lightweight but not at all see through. I bought for a trip and they pack amazingly well with zero wrinkles. Run true to size.

bought this for a trip. I wanted a quick dry fabric that I could easily wash. I am 5’4” weigh 127 lbs 36” chest and 29” waist. It fits nicely and has a good shape with a slight flare at the bottom. It’s a bit longer than I prefer but I still like it. I did wash it on the trip and it dried by the next day so I was pleased. The blue color is pretty much what it shows. I also like the detail at the top. It was a good purchase.
I purchased three (3) of these shirts in an XXL, fit perfect and love the colors.  Just wish maybe they made them in a print fabric.  I will probably purchase more of the other colors.  Thank you
nice shirt ... perfect for underlayer on cold day ... runs tight
This is a great workout top for women out there who want a little extra coverage! Lightweight and comfortable.

I love this shirt.  Soft & comfortable.  Longer sleeves than those shirts that have short angel sleeves.  Feels like a t-shirt, but looks fancier than that.  Fits me quite well.  The sewing design at the top attracts attention up (rather than on hips or elsewhere).  I'm 4' 10" and 175 lbs.  I bought size 3XL when I usually wear a 2 XL (from remarks in other reviews).  Of course, being short, I had to hem the bottom quite a bit.  The blue is very pretty.  I hope to order more of these, for sure.

I love this shirt. I like that it is longer and doesn't sit up so high. I have been able to wear it during yoga and it does not slip up but stays nicely in place.  I have  done hot yoga in it a few times and the moisture wicking works very well.

I was not expecting this blouse to be so nice.  Love the color, the fit, the quality and the style. I will like buy a couple more in different colors.  The perfect workout wear, but nice enough for every day.
The fit was great, and I love the material.  It packs well.
True to size with flattering fit.  Travels well
Mine was too large, I ordered a extra-large.  I'm sending it Back & going to order a large.  I just love the style.

I like this top. I was hoping to get something that would wear cool on a hot day outdoors. It was a little warmer than I had hoped. I liked how it draped, though, and like the color. I wish there had been more color choices in my size. There weren’t as many choices for me, although this was a choice I would have made.
Extremely good looking and comfortable.  Washes up nicely. Hang to dry and no iron needed.
I love the way the material hangs and doesn’t hold sweat

This is one of the most comfortable shirts I own, fits perfect after looking at their size chart.  Washed looking like new and no ironing needed.  Wore entire day and looked like I just put it on again no creases or wrinkles.  Love the color and the fit and the fabric, and the price.
I like these shirts.  They are comfortable to wear for excerise.
Love the shirt, color is just as pictured. The lines give it a little sporty style so it's not as plain. I might buy it in 1 more color. Shirt is soft and it dosent hug in the hips.
Very soft and roomy.  I would have preferred the neckline to be even higher--more mandarin--but I still like it a lot.
Material feels good
Good size, it goes in at the waist.  length is good also, not too long.
The comfort of this shirt is amazing.
Fits well

The length of this top is a really good quality and size. As a fitness instructor to older adults, I'm always looking for tops that are a bit on the longer side. I will definitely order more of this style/brand.
Was great quick dry hiking near the equator - very hot/humid- but shirt dried quickly.
Fits small. I ordered XXL normally wear large/xl but it was not as flowy through body and fit tight across mid drift area. Also, not a true black color, more dark charcoal grey.

I needed a biking shirt with more coverage after a year of doing nothing but overeating!  I now probably wear a size 14, ordered an XXL and it was perfect!  Not too snug, but not too loose.  I wear a 38D bra and had I ordered a smaller size, I would not have been comfortable wearing it.  Love the length, the moisture-wicking ability of the fabric, and the styling in general.  Very pleased with this shirt and will wear it all through the coming Texas summer (sleeves rolled up, natch)!
I do yoga frequently and it is loose enough not to bind, and fitted enough not to look like a sac.  It is attractive in color and style.

评论概述: Loved the Shirt but too Large Around the Neck
评论详情: I really liked these shirts but the neck was too large and was too tight around the midsection. Since it was a workout shirt, I figured it would have been looser around the midsection. I returned it.
I was not expecting it to be so long. I'm 5'2 and it fits below my butt. it feels like it will not wrinkle. I will let you know once i wash them
Nice golf shirt.  Size up if you want a little extra room.  Snug fit in waist, but very nice looking.
Fit perfect.  Have had a lot of comments they like having a zipper.  Will order another one.

I bought two and wear them to PT after shoulder surgery. They slide over the head easily. I hand wash mine - they do bleed - and dry them on a rack on the lanai. Takes only a few minutes to dry, but I'm in Florida.

This is a very nice workout shirt. It has long sleeves with the thumb cutout at the wrist. I don’t get too hot or cold when wearing it. Love the color. I’m 5’5” and 135-140 lbs and the medium fit me perfectly

My main issue is the whole bottom half of the sleeve. While I ordered up to have a looser feel for the gym, the bottom half of the arms are insanely baggy. Then there’s the thumb hole which is why I wanted this to begin with. They put it in the seam, it runs down the middle of your arm instead of the side…ya know where your thumb actually sits
I liked the length and lightweight fabric
Shirt color is exactly as pictured.  Nice material
Do they wear this outside, it just absorbs heat. Seems under arms are a bit thick. Nice and stretchy. But works alright besides
Looks beautiful. The material is so nice. It doesn’t wrinkle at all.  Washes beautifully.

Very cute. Pretty rose color and is lightweight, which is perfect for Florida, where I live.
I am very pleased with this shirt. It fits well and washes up nicely.
